title: Name ideas for a 3v3 Club
body:
Hey guys, I'm looking to start a club that aims  to offer OCE players a place to find other TT players, since the current player base is so small I hope it both servers as a social hot spot as well as help new players experience the treeline.

The problem is, I can't think of any decent club names/tags... As of yet I've only got straight forward ones such as 'TT OCE' or 'OC3'. So I'd like to ask for your thoughts/ideas.

**What is the best 3v3 club name you can think of?**

If you're interested in joining the club, or even just the discord feel free to add me in-game,
Summoner name: Jirah


Thanks in advance for any responses!

replies.body: If you like Dirk Gently, then 'The Rowdy 3' would be appropriate (note: there's more than 3 of them).
